intro.text: You, {playerName}, have just moved to a new town. It's quiet and seems like the perfect place to start fresh. One day, while at a local caf√©, you meet {loverName}. They seem charming and friendly.

firstEncounter_friendly.text: {loverName} smiles warmly at you. 'It's nice to meet someone new in town,' they say. Over the next few days, you notice {loverName} showing up wherever you go. You also start making friends, including {friendName}, who becomes quite close to you.

firstEncounter_distant.text: {loverName} seems taken aback by your distance but doesn't push further. Over the next few days, you notice {loverName} showing up wherever you go. You also start making friends, including {friendName}, who becomes quite close to you.

growingObsession_confront.text: You decide to confront {loverName}. They seem hurt but agree to give you some space. However, you still feel watched. The situation escalates quickly. {loverName} starts showing up at your workplace and even around your home.

growingObsession_ignore.text: You try to ignore {loverName}, but their presence becomes more unsettling. You receive messages from them daily. The situation escalates quickly. {loverName} starts showing up at your workplace and even around your home.

growingObsession_help.text: You talk to {friendName} about {loverName}. They advise you to be cautious and offer their support. The situation escalates quickly. {loverName} starts showing up at your workplace and even around your home.

talkToFamily.text: You decide to talk to your family about the situation. {familyMemberName} is particularly worried and suggests a family intervention.

familyIntervention.text: You agree to the family intervention. {familyMemberName} confronts {loverName} with you. {loverName} reacts aggressively.

declineIntervention.text: You decline the intervention and decide to handle things on your own. The situation with {loverName} continues to worsen.

friendHelp.text: You confide in {friendName} again. They suggest involving a private detective or going to the police.

privateDetective.text: You hire {detectiveName}, a private detective. They start investigating {loverName}'s background.

choices.text: Take matters into your own hands

detectiveCooperation.text: {detectiveName} finds disturbing information about {loverName}. You realize the situation is more serious than you thought.

handleItYourself.text: You decide to handle things on your own. The confrontation with {loverName} becomes inevitable.

policeIntervention.text: You go to the police. They take your concerns seriously and decide to investigate {loverName}.

choices.text: Take matters into your own hands

confrontation.text: You confront {loverName} directly. They reveal their true nature, showing signs of violence and desperation.

escapeTown.text: You decide to leave the town in the middle of the night, hoping to escape {loverName}'s obsession.

familyHelp.text: {familyMemberName} helps you plan your escape. Together, you leave the town, hoping for a fresh start.

choices.text: Stay with family for a while

ending_police.text: The police arrest {loverName}. You're safe, but the trauma of the experience stays with you.

ending_violent.text: In a tragic turn of events, {loverName} becomes violent, leading to a confrontation that ends badly for both of you.

ending_escape.text: You manage to escape the town, leaving {loverName} behind. The experience haunts you, but you're free.

ending_selfRealization.text: You realize the depth of {loverName}'s obsession and take steps to protect yourself, eventually leaving the town for good.

ending_newCity.text: You move to a new city and start fresh. The memory of {loverName} fades over time, and you find peace.

ending_stayWithFamily.text: You stay with {familyMemberName} for a while. Their support helps you recover from the ordeal, and you eventually find happiness again.
